hadiths.text: Jabir b. Samura reported:(The dead body) of a person who had killed himself with a broad-headed arrow was brought before the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ), but he did not offer prayers for him

chapter.ara-name: باب تَرْكِ الصَّلاَةِ عَلَى الْقَاتِلِ نَفْسَهُ
chapter.eng-name: Leaving the funeral prayer for one who committed suicide
